item.title: Java/RSCA Client question
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

Ok so I was wondering how I would go about doing this.
So, I want make a command(CLIENT SIDE COMMAND) that will run my .class and open the gui.
(.class is in V2\src\org\rscangel\client) what would I add to the mudclient for it to load/run the gui?
This has nothing to do with serverside

Thanks also if you do not know what I mean please send a message.

import java.awt.*; import java.awt.event.*; import javax.swing.*; public class Frame1 extends JFrame { JPanel pane = new JPanel(); Frame1() { super("My Simple Frame"); setBounds(100,100,300,100); setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE); Container con = this.getContentPane(); con.add(pane); //THIS WAS JUST AN EXAMPLE setVisible(true); } public static void main(String args[]) {new Frame1();} }

Read full topic
